title: Cleveland Browns, Antonio Brown, Dak Prescott and Kyler Murray
itunes:title: Cleveland Browns, Antonio Brown, Dak Prescott and Kyler Murray
description:
Colin has strong words for the loudest guys at the party--the Cleveland Browns.  Also, don't expect Antonio Brown to be in New England for the long term--the Patriots, under head coach Bill Belichick, have historically picked up troubled players and used them briefly and strategically.  Finally, now that Dallas Cowboy quarterback Dak Prescott has a better supporting cast, Colin isn't surprised at all that the Dallas offense is blooming--Dak just needed a few more toys in his ensemble. 

Guests include: Michael Vick, Trent Dilfer, Bill Romanowski and Bucky Brooks.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
